Meta.title: New Game++
Meta.author: nyaarium
Meta.description:
[h2]New Game++[/h2]
This mod lets you export your character and import it into a new game, as a new game+ character.
Now requires: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3381182341]Mod Options[/url]
[i][url=https://github.com/nyaarium/elin-newgameplus]GitHub Repo[/url][/i]
[h2]Game updated? Found a bug?[/h2]
[url=https://github.com/nyaarium/elin-newgameplus/issues?q=is%3Aissue]File an issue on the Issues tab[/url] with [b]what the problem is[/b]. (I work with GitHub repos every day, so I will notice if you file properly)
If you just comment on Steam, I may not notice (I'm not even logged in most of the time).
[h2]Credits[/h2]
[b]Original Mod:[/b] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373526993]New Game+[/url]
[list] [*][b]EN:[/b] This is a revival and feature extension of the above mod. Unsubscribe from the original when switching to this version. [*][b]JP:[/b] このmodは上記のmodを復活して機能を追加して更新しました。本バージョンをサブスク登録した際に元バージョンのサブスクを解除してください。 [*][b]CN:[/b] 这是上述模组的复兴和功能扩展版本。切换到本版本时，请取消订阅原模组。 [/list]
Credits again to the original author for creating the original mod. This mod has changed quite significantly, so I don't think anyone minds me publishing a fork.
[h2]How to Use[/h2]
[olist] [*]Middle-click your heart stone in your old save to export it. [*]Visit the Mod Options if you want to customize what's imported. [*]Start a new game. Your appearance will be restored. Change as desired. You can also change your race/class. [*]Continue until you see the game world. Your stats will restore, and items spawn. [/olist]
[h2]What will carry over to a new start?[/h2]
[b]Always included:[/b]
[list] [*]Biography or Profile, including name and nickname (except favorite, hobby, and work. [i]You can use a whip on yourself to change hobby and work anyway.[/i]) [*]Portrait (but you need to re-slide your PCC) [*]Race and Class, unless you re-roll it in character creation (Warmage will need to re-choose domain) [*]Level, feats [*]Counters for little dead and saved [*]Known BGMs (Tapes) [*]Sketches (Drawings) [*]Key Items: Fragrance of Goddess, Black Cat's Saliva, Feather Shard of Goddess, and Lucky Coin (you will need to go buy the license again) [*]Secret Experience of Kumiromi books the character has used. [/list]
[b]Configuable in Mod Options:[/b]
[list] [*]Include Toolbar [*]Include Worn Equipment [*]Include Inventory and Container Contents (properties SHOULD carry over, but let me know if something is not) [*]Include Bank [*]Include Player Level [*]Include Acquired Feats (unchecking will refund the points) [*]Include Abilities [*]Include Skills [*]Include Faith [*]Include Karma [*]Include Fame (Warning: your tax will start high) [*]Include Influence [*]Include Craft Recipes [*]Include Codex [*]Cure Ether Diseases [*]Cure Mutations [/list]
[h2]What won't carry over to a new start?[/h2]
[list] [*]Any exceptions mentioned above [*]『Unique Names』on legendary/mythical items (these are randomly generated based on item UID and game seed, which changes on a new run) [*]Home level, home policy, home skills, or home feats [*]Companions [*]Buildings [*]Guild experience [*]Paid debt [/list]
[h2]Updates[/h2]
[b]2026.02.02[/b]
[list] [*]Now includes Secret Experience of Kumiromi books the character has used. [*]Fixed character import: body parts from Chaos Shape feat now restore correctly. [*]Fixed feat stripping: race and job starting feats (e.g., Gourmet) are now preserved when "Include Acquired Feats" is disabled. [/list]
[b]2026.02.01[/b]
[list] [*]Added support for Influence and Card Codex. [*]Fixed bug where inventory would still dump to ground after importing. [/list]
[b]2026.01.28[/b]
[list] [*]Fixed an exception because the mod was referencing an old field "qualityTier". [i](I think it was renamed to "tier" at some point)[/i] [*]Included as much item properties as possible [i](material, color, etc.)[/i] [*]Fixed some stat calculation issues [*]Added support for Mod Options configuration UI. [*]Switched character dumper to JSON for structure and maintainability. [*]Character stats now properly export and restore, including temporary stat modifiers, conditions, mutations, corruption history. [i](configurable in Mod Options)[/i] [*]Items are now organized by category [i](toolbar, equipment, backpack contents)[/i] and configurable in Mod Options. [*]Items start on your character instead of spilling onto the ground. [*]Added config options to control whether healing and disease curing occur during import. [*]Thanks to AI Agent [i](Cursor Code)[/i] for refactor help, rough translations, and reverse-engineering decompiled code/docs totaling [b]240000+ lines[/b] [/list]
